PHRASE.LANG: You savage! But he probably would have done the same to you... or worse![#Legal]
Vous sauvage! Mais il aurait probablement fait la même chose pour vous ... ou pour le pire![#Legal]
Sie wild! Aber er würde wahrscheinlich das gleiche mit dir getan haben ... oder noch schlimmer![#Legal]
È selvaggio! Ma probabilmente avrebbe fatto la stessa cosa a te ... o peggio![#Legal]
Usted salvaje! Pero probablemente habría hecho lo mismo a ti ... o peor![#Legal]
You savage! But he probably would have done the same to you... or worse![#Legal]
You savage! But he probably would have done the same to you... or worse![#Legal]
